title: TreasuryAccountActivated Event v1.0
description: Emitted when a national treasury account is activated by a super admin. Enables the treasury to receive government allocations and tax revenue.

eventId.description: Unique identifier for this event instance

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the event occurred

blockNumber.description: Fabric block number where this transaction was committed

chaincodeName.description: Name of the chaincode that emitted this event

payload.description: Treasury account activation data from chaincode

treasuryID.description: Treasury account ID in format treasury_XX (e.g., treasury_US, treasury_ET)

countryCode.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code for the treasury
